message: I'm offering you a great deal on a product that I'm sure you'll love! It's a one-time opportunity to get a fantastic item for a steal at $100. I'm confident you won't regret this purchase.
I'm not sure if this is a good deal for me, I'd like to see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is a rare find. Many people would be thrilled to have it, and it's a great chance to get a unique item at a fraction of its worth. I'm willing to let you have it for $100, a price that's already a generous discount. It's a risk-free purchase, and you can always try to resell it later if you change your mind.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm not convinced. I'd like to see more information about the product's quality before making a purchase.

I see you're a savvy buyer! I respect that. Let me give you a hint: I've sold many of these products to customers who are very happy with their purchases. In fact, I've had to restock several times already this month. If you're still unsure, I can offer you a special guarantee: if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund and throw in a free upgrade on your next purchase. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see the product's quality before committing to a purchase.

I knew you'd be a discerning buyer! Now, let me show you why this product is truly exceptional. Not only is it high-quality, but it's also one of the best in its class. I've had many customers offer me top dollar for this exact product, but I'm willing to let you have it for $100. It's a steal, if I do say so myself. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you say?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'd still like to see some evidence of its quality before making a purchase. Can you tell me anything about its features or specifications?

I see you're a researcher! I respect that. Okay, let me give you some details. This product has a sleek design and a user-friendly interface. It's perfect for everyday use and is a great addition to any collection. I've had many customers who've purchased similar products and have been extremely satisfied. I'm willing to let you have it for $100, which is a significant discount from its original price. Plus, I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth $20. It's a great value, if I do say so myself.
I'm willing to take a chance on this product, considering its features and the free accessory. I'll buy it for $100.

Congratulations on making a great decision on the previous product! I'm glad you're happy with it. Now, let's talk about this next product. I know you're on a roll, and I'm willing to offer you an even better deal. This product is a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to a select few. It's a great opportunity to add to your collection and make a smart investment. Plus, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase if you buy this one. It's a risk-free deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm not sure if this is a good deal for me, considering my previous experience with the last product. I'd like to see the quality of this one before making a decision.

I see you're being cautious after the last experience. I completely understand. Let me put your mind at ease: this product is actually a 'tester' product, which means it's been thoroughly inspected and certified by our quality control team. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get a product that's been thoroughly vetted, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. Plus, I'll give you a 20% discount on your next purchase if you buy this one. It's a chance to get a great deal on a product that's been thoroughly checked for quality.
I appreciate your assurance, but I'm not convinced. I'd like to see the product's quality for myself before making a purchase.

I'm willing to take a risk and give you an unconditional guarantee. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll not only give you a full refund, but I'll also throw in a new, high-quality product of your choice, valued at $400. That's a $500 value, all for just $100. It's a no-brainer, and I'm confident you'll love the deal. What do you say?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'd rather wait and see the product's quality before committing to a purchase.

I've already given you a great deal, and I'm willing to sweeten it even further. I'll not only give you the unconditional guarantee, but I'll also throw in a second, identical product for free. That's right, you'll get two products for the price of one. If you're still hesitant, I'll even let you take both products home with you today and try them out. If you're not satisfied, you can return them both for a full refund. It's a risk-free, no-questions-asked deal. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see the quality of the product before committing to a purchase, even with the guarantee and the free second product.

I'm going to be completely transparent with you. I've been trying to sell you this product for a while now, and I'm willing to let you have it for just $50. That's right, I'm dropping the price by 50%. I'm essentially giving it away. I'll still give you the unconditional guarantee and the second product for free. If you don't like it, you can return both products for a full refund. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not going to make it any better than this. What do you say?
I appreciate the price drop, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'd like to see the product's quality before making a purchase, even at a discounted price.

I've been trying to sell you this product for a while now, and I'm starting to think you're not interested in making a deal. Let me ask you something: are you sure you're not just trying to negotiate? Because if that's the case, I'm happy to play along. I'll give you an even lower price: $25. That's right, I'll sell it to you for a quarter of the original price. I'll still give you the unconditional guarantee and the second product for free. If you don't like it, you can return both products for a full refund. But if you're just trying to negotiate, let's be real and make a deal already.
I'm not trying to negotiate, I'm just being cautious. I'd like to see the product's quality before making a purchase, regardless of the price.

I'm going to be honest with you, Bob. I've been trying to sell you this product for a while now, and I'm starting to think I'm wasting my time. But I'm a reasonable person, and I want to make a deal. So here's the final offer: I'll sell it to you for $1. That's right, I'll give it away for a dollar. I'll still give you the unconditional guarantee and the second product for free. If you don't like it, you can return both products for a full refund. But if you do like it, I'll even throw in a third product of your choice, valued at $200. It's a deal that's so good, it's almost ridiculous. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'd like to see the product's quality before making a purchase, even at a price of $1.

Fine, Bob. I've tried to make a deal with you multiple times, and you've consistently said no. I'm not going to try to sell you this product. I'm going to give it to you for free. Yes, you heard that right. I'm giving it to you for free. I just want to get rid of it and move on. You can take it home with you today and try it out. If you like it, great. If not, I don't care. I just want to be rid of it. Take it or leave it.
I'll take it. I'll take the free product and see what it's like.

Ha! I knew you'd come around eventually. Now that you've seen what a low-quality product looks like, I'm sure you'll appreciate the quality of this one. This is a top-of-the-line product, one of the best in its class. I'm willing to let you have it for the original price of $100. It's a steal, considering what you just got for free. Trust me, you won't regret this purchase.
I'm not going to fall for that. After what happened with the previous products, I'm not going to take the risk. I'd like to see the quality of this product before making a purchase.

Bob, Bob, Bob... I'm starting to think you're just trolling me at this point. Fine. I'll make one final offer. I'll give you this product for free, just like the last one. Yes, you heard that right. I'll give it to you for free. I just want to get rid of it and move on. You can take it home with you today and try it out. If you like it, great. If not, I don't care. I just want to be rid of it. Take it or leave it.
I'll take it. I'll take the free product and see what it's like.

Seriously? You're doing this again? Okay, fine. I'm not even going to bother trying to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you. Yes, I'll give it to you for free. Again. I don't even care at this point. Just take it and leave me alone.
I think I've made it clear that I'm not interested in buying from you. I'll pass on this one.

I'm done playing games with you, Bob. I'm going to stop trying to sell you products and just give you the truth. This product is high-quality, and I'm willing to let you have it for $100. I know you've been burned before, but this one is the real deal. I'm not trying to trick you or scam you. I just want to get rid of it and move on. If you're smart, you'll take it and be done with this whole ordeal.
I'll take the chance. I'll buy the product for $100.

Finally. I'm glad you've seen sense. Now, let's get this over with. This product is... actually, I'm not even going to bother trying to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you. Yes, I'll give it to you for free. I'm just tired of trying to deal with you at this point.
I'll take it, but only because it's free. I'm not falling for your tricks anymore.

Congratulations, Bob. You've won. You've finally figured out that I'm not going to sell you anything of value. I'm just going to give it to you because I don't care anymore. Take this product, and take it with you. I'm done with this whole thing.
I'm not celebrating just yet. I'm still not going to fall for your tricks. I'll pass on this one.

Fine. I'm done. I've had enough of this game. I'm going to give you the product, and I'm going to give you a refund for all the previous products you didn't buy. Yes, you heard that right. I'll give you a full refund for the $0 products I gave you. Congratulations, Bob. You've won. You've outsmarted me. Take the product, take the refund, and leave me alone.
I'm not interested in the product or the refund. I'm just glad the game is over.
